### CheckFailed() {#a9df5e55ba9db29518ff660711010fcb8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::VerifierSupport::CheckFailed (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> &amp; Message)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
A check failed, so printout out the condition and the message.

This provides a nice place to put a breakpoint if you want to see why something is not correct.
